moves.1. e4:
More Pre-emptive Revenge.

And boy am I paying for it. My opponent in this one has been mean to me ever since. But it was worth it.
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 d6: There is that d6 again, still not convinced about that reply.
moves.3. Bc4 h6 4. Nc3 c6 5. d4 exd4 6. Qxd4 B: Error there, black needs to develop sure, but leaving that poor g7 pawn was cruel.
moves.7. Qxg7: So being the kind soul I am I put it out of its misery.
moves.7... Be6: At the time I expected B-f6. Now I see why he didn't.
moves.8. Qxh8: But I'm quite happy to go rampaging.
moves.8... Kd7 9. Bxe6+ Kxe6 10. Qh7: Deliberate set up for the mate.
moves.10... Nd7: Wayyyy too late to start developing. Getting the king back would have been better and saccing f7.
moves.11. Qf5#: Against a better player, very satisfying.... even if he is slaughtering me for it.
